DESCRIPTION: Card becomes Jammed. Jammed cards have no effect and unjam when played.
This card has no effect. Unjams when played.
Blighted creatures lose #b50 HP when reaching #b20 Blight, then lose #b20 Blight.
Unplayable. Plays itself when drawn, Exhausts itself, and draws 1 card.
Downgrading a card removes #y1 upgrade from it. Unupgraded cards cannot be Downgraded.
